auto-gitter.overview: Automation tool to individually commit every file changed within a directory

bus-routes-optimiser.overview: B2B optimisation model that recommends the best routes for buses to pick up workers

chords-search-engine.overview: Web scraper that finds, standardises and analyses the chord progression of any song

dynamic-resource-optimiser.overview: Machine learning model that recommends the optimal placement of emergency vehicles and fire bases in Singapore

edumate.overview: Address book that facilitates scheduling meetups with friends based on location and availability

geospatial-extraction-framework.overview: Web scraping tool for extracting, parsing and harmonising geospatial data from the various sources

geospatial-management-framework.overview: Python library containing data structures and algorithms that facilitate the processing and management of geospatial data in Singapore

halal-food-recommender.overview: Telegram Bot that recommends halal food options based on location and cuisine

japanese-vocab-trainer.overview: Anki-like Rust CLI application for practicing Japanese Kanji

malls-of-singapore.overview: Statistics-driven card game based on the shopping malls of Singapore

meetup-maker.overview: Geospatial app that recommends meetup locations based on user positions

mrt-paths-analysis.overview: Analysis of Hamiltonian Paths in Singapore's MRT network as part of a weekly puzzle challenge

note-together.overview: Note-sharing platform that incorporates Reddit and GitHub-like features

notes-telegram-bot.overview: Telegram Bot that lets users review notes on the go, featuring search and quiz functionality

programming-lines-counter.overview: Automation tool that counts the number of lines of code for each programming language

sentence-searcher.overview: Web scraper that extracts vocabulary and sample sentences for Chinese, Japanese and Korean words

spiderman-web-scraper.overview: Quality of life tool that simplifies the web scraping process by providing shortcuts to common workflows

website-astro.overview: Personal website featuring map integration, quizzes and games

website-react.overview: Personal website featuring map integration, quizzes and games
